支持排序·筛选·搜索功能 | 已人工屏蔽部分路透用户 | 暂只支持8月16日后上线的作品

```{r vie}
# vie[,c("titlelink","lengthnum","viewnum","text","upload","uplink")]
htmltools::tags$script(src = "mysetting.js")

datatable(vie, filter = 'top',style ="bootstrap",
#####################
          options = list(
                        pagingType="numbers",
                        pageLength = 30,
                        language = list(search = '搜索:',
                        lengthMenu='每页显示 _MENU_ 个视频',
                        zeroRecords='什么也没找到，换个关键词试试',
                        info='现在第 _PAGE_ 页 共 _PAGES_ 页',
                        infoEmpty='没有可显示的页面',
                        infoFiltered='(从 _MAX_ 项中搜索)',
                        paginate=list(previous='上一页',
                        'next'='下一页',
                        first='第一页',
                        last='最后一页')),
                        
                        columnDefs = list(
                        list(targets=2,
                        render = JS(
                     "function(data, type, row, meta) {",
                     "return type === 'display'?",
                     "'<span title=\"'+data +'\">'+Math.floor(data/60) + '分'+Math.floor(data%60)+'秒</span>' : data;",
                     "}")
              ),
              list(targets=3,
                   render = JS(
                     "function(data, type, row, meta) {",
                     "return type === 'display' && data>=10000 ?",
                     "'<span title=\"' + data + '\">'+Math.floor(data/1000)/10+'万</span>' : data;",
                     "}")
              ),
               list(targets=3,
                   render = JS(
                     "function(data, type, row, meta) {",
                     "return type === 'display' && data>=10000 ?",
                     "'<span title=\"' + data + '\">'+Math.floor(data/1000)/10+'万</span>' : data;",
                     "}")
              ),
              list(targets= '_all',
                createdCell=JS(
                  "function (td, cellData, rowData, row, col) {",
                    "$(td).css('padding', '8px 4px 8px 4px')",
                  "}")
              ),
              list(targets=2:5,
                   class="dt-body-center"),
              list(targets='_all',
                   class="dt-head-center")
          )),
          escape = FALSE,
          colnames = c("标题","时长","观看","弹幕","日期","UP")
          )

```
